dialogue: I don't want employees who are only working for the money.
I want employees who are working to make the world a better place.
How does working here make the world a better place?
Half of our products cause cancer, and the other half don't work at all.
One could argue that every day we spend working here makes the planet a little bit worse.
Is that why I never see you doing any work?
When did it become a crime to care about people? Sheesh!
